parameters: \.I'm not sure... But, the atmosphere changed completely.
\.If I'm being completely honest? It might even be
Yeah, this is way worse than the hallway.
\C[3]Something's sitting next to the stuffed animals.
Hey... let me get a closer look at those.
\.Essentially, they’re toy bullets, kind of like blanks.
If you load them into a gun, they won’t actually fire.
\.Ah, right. We should get Keiji to inspect them.
This is more in his department, so maybe he can
\.\C[4](I'm hoping they can give us some kind of clue
\C[3]A clothed doll torso leans against the wall.
U-Uh... i-it’s not gonna start moving, is it?
Related to the head in the box?
Related to the head in the box?
\.Do you remember what that note Keiji had said?
Didn't it say something like "find my body?"
That quick thinking of yours is, uh... very unique.
M-More importantly... I think it has something
to do with the doll head we found in that box.
"\C[2]Find my body\C[0]..." If I remember correctly, there was
a note inside that said something like that, right?
\.Maybe we can combine the doll head with the torso...
For now, we should keep exploring! Ahaha...
\C[3]A clothed doll torso leans against the wall.
Let’s, uh... get back to this
\C[3]A clothed doll torso leans against the wall.
Related to the head in the box?
Related to the head in the box?
\.Do you remember what that note Keiji had said?
A note... O-Oh! Yeah, yeah, yeah!
Uhhh... I mean... I guess? Heh... Heheh...
You uh... sure get some interesting ideas,
...Man, why do you keep doing this to me! \fi*sigh*\fi
Anyway, you think this might be related to that
doll head in the box from earlier?
Like the note that Keiji had...
\.Maybe we can combine the doll head with the torso...
\.Okay, maybe we'll try that once we
run out of other places to search.
\.Sounds good to me! Let's search around some more!
\C[3]A clothed doll torso leans against the wall.
\C[4](Head, left arm, right arm, left leg, right leg...
Let's look around some more first, Sara!
Yeah, let's do it. I'll call the others.
\.\C[3]Could probably combine this with another item.
\C[3]Stuck the Dart into the large hole in the center of
Can I fire the dart with this now?)
A tool for cutting a cigar to smoke it.
A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.
What's the large hold in the center for...?
\.\C[3]Could probably combine this with another item.
\C[3]Stuck the Dart into the large hole
in the center of the Revolver.
Can I fire the dart with this now?)
\C[3]Dummy bullets. I have 6. If you pull the trigger
with these, it'll only make a sound.
Can be loaded into a gun and fired. Extremely lethal.
